x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/subscription-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/Subscription \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"Subscription","id":"a1b609fd-c454-444b-8c56-259d0d1a212c","status":"requested","contact":[{"system":"phone","value":"ext 4123"}],"end":"2021-01-01T08:00:00.000+08:00","reason":"Monitor new neonatal function","criteria":"Observation?code=http://loinc.org|1975-2","channel":{"type":"rest-hook","endpoint":"https://biliwatch.com/customers/mount-auburn-miu/on-result","payload":"application/fhir+json","header":["Authorization: Bearer secret-token-abc-123"]},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.624+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
